Wow, look at all the rare insects!

There are even *heteropteran insects.

See,

I told you.

And you won’t

see those moths at

school!

Man, what am

I doing here?

I’ve got to

capture some
of these as specimens.

I’m so glad

we came

here!

*Heteroptera : A large group of about 40,000 species of insects in the Order Hemiptera.
